item.description:
This group is for fun, laughter, learning, and networking with other Multicultural Women in the city looking to build friendships, self-improvement & More!

HOW WE WORK TODAY: Currently we are just building  this group name  in Boston, and therefore we will be building our membership & connecting via our  Facebook page at: Multicultral Women's Network or copy and paste this link: https://www.facebook.com/groups/girlsonly2011/

Come join us there to discuss group activity options, blog about multicultural women's topics, and meet new friends in the area.

Summer Group Activities

Group Activities Are Always Fun, Empowering, & SMALL!

Why Small Groups? We keep the activities small so you can really get to know one another.  With the exception of the Brunch, no more than 12 in a group.

Whys start in the summer? These activities will be planned for the summer as Boston is best enjoyed during the warmer months :)

Example of Activities Include, But Not Limited to:

  • Movies
  • Plays
  • Museums
  • Potlucks
  • Bi-Monthly Themed Brunches & Workshop: that host guest speakers
  • Happy Hours around the city
  • Dancing
  • Sports Activities
  • Trips*
  • Much More!

BIG R&R TRIP TO COSTA RICA, Fall  2014! We also have a Big Women's Yoga Retreat & Spa Trip in Costa Rica coming up in the Spring & Summer of 2014 at Pura Vida Yoga & Spa Retreat in Alajuela, Costa Rica! Workshops on relationship building and personal development will be hosted by the group co-organizers, which will be fun and relaxing.  Please stay tuned for more details!
item.name: Multicultural Women's Network (MWN): Boston
